result.eng: Slim chance she will find anything there.
result.ga: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.orig: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.html: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.
result.ponchtml: Beag an baol go n-aimseoiḋ sí rud ar biṫ ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.

result.eng: His talk was a little obscure.
result.ga: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.orig: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.html: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.

result.eng: There was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ga: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.orig: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.html: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seomra beag in uaċtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.

result.eng: It was a little difficult.
result.ga: Bhí sé rud beag deacair
result.orig: Bhí sé rud beag deacair
result.html: Bhí sé rud beag deacairIt was a little difficult.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé rud beag deacairIt was a little difficult.

result.eng: You're only a small boy.
result.ga: Níl ionat ach buachaill beag
result.orig: Níl ionat ach buachaill beag
result.html: Níl ionat ach buachaill beagYou're only a small boy.
result.ponchtml: Níl ionat aċ buaċaill beagYou're only a small boy.

result.eng: I almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ga: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.orig: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.html: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ponchtml: Is beag a ċeap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.

result.eng: You're only a small girl.
result.ga: Níl ionat ach cailín beag
result.orig: Níl ionat ach cailín beag
result.html: Níl ionat ach cailín beagYou're only a small girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl ionat aċ cailín beagYou're only a small girl.

result.eng: A story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ga: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.orig: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.html: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ponchtml: Scéal faoi ċailín beag a ṫéann isteaċ sa ċoillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.

result.eng: Gaudí's buildings are a little strange.
result.ga: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag ait
result.orig: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag ait
result.html: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag aitGaudí's buildings are a little strange.
result.ponchtml: Tá foirgniṁ de ċuid Gaudí rud beag aitGaudí's buildings are a little strange.

result.eng: I am a little tired.
result.ga: Tá mé rud beag tuirseach
result.orig: Tá mé rud beag tuirseach
result.html: Tá mé rud beag tuirseachI am a little tired.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé rud beag tuirseaċI am a little tired.

result.eng: It's a small town.
result.ga: Is baile beag é
result.orig: Is baile beag é
result.html: Is baile beag éIt's a small town.
result.ponchtml: Is baile beag éIt's a small town.

result.eng: You were so alike when you were little!
result.ga: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.orig: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.html: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beagYou were so alike when you were little!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siḃ ċoṁ cosúil lena ċéile nuair a ḃí siḃ beagYou were so alike when you were little!

result.eng: I live in a small town.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beagI live in a small town.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i mbaile beagI live in a small town.

result.eng: I'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seo
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seo
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seoI'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Ċill Dara na laeṫanta seoI'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.

result.eng: I live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha CliathI live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i dteaċ beag gar do lár na caṫraċ i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫI live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.html: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ponchtml: Rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.orig: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.html: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ponchtml: Is beag duine ar doṁan gur cuiṁin leis lá an ḋúnṁaraiṫe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.

result.eng: Some ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ga: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.orig: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.html: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ponchtml: Beagnaċ deiċ mbliana ó ẛin d'éiriġ mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ga: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.orig: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.html: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ponchtml: Anseo i Nua-Eaḃrac ḃí criṫ beag talún againn an tseaċtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.

result.eng: Apart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
result.ga: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhanna
result.orig: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhanna
result.html: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhannaApart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
result.ponchtml: Díomaite de ċorrḃlag fánaċ is beag nuaẛonrú a ḋéantar ar ḟorṁór na suíoṁannaApart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ga: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.orig: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.html: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ponchtml: Is beag sásaṁ a ḃaintear as aṫċúrsáil a ḋéanaṁ ar áḃar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile ċeana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.orig: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.html: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ponchtml: Is beag aisċoṫú a fuair scríḃneoirí áiriṫe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.

result.eng: Hardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ga: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
result.orig: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
result.html: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireachtHardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.

result.eng: Wow, she's so small!
result.ga: Órú chomh beag léi
result.orig: Órú chomh beag léi
result.html: Órú chomh beag léiWow, she's so small!
result.ponchtml: Órú ċoṁ beag léiWow, she's so small!

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: Baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.

result.eng: How little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ga: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.orig: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.html: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ponchtml: Cá beag duit a ḃfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.orig: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.html: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ leat a ċur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ga: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.orig: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.html: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
result.ga: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.html: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dóA little while after it got dark...
